headline.main: WAR WIFE. By Renee Shann. 305 pp. New York: Carlton House. $2.

lead_paragraph: HERE is a fancy to curdle the blood of a young girl about to be married. This is said not to frighten away young girl readers but rather to attract all such minds, for the lapse of memory, the wiles of a beautiful rival, even the attempted murder, are decently taken care of and the R. A.F. pilot restored to the arms of his bride before the end of the story.
